2.5.5: Critical Bug Fix (Duplicate MR Print): Overhauled logic to resolve persistent timeouts by correctly handling page loading behavior.
Critical Bug Fix (Firefox PDF Saving): Fixed error preventing PDF saves in Firefox on 'MR Gen' and 'Duplicate MR Print' tabs.
Improvement (MR Gen): Automation now waits up to 30 seconds for the 'Technical Staff' list to populate, preventing timeouts on slow connections.
Improvement (UI/UX): Added a user-friendly pop-up if automation is started before a browser is launched.
Improvement (UI/UX): Standardized PDF filenames for 'Duplicate MR Print' to use the last 6 digits of the work code.
